description: Apollo 11 audio cue catalog for HUD and mission callouts

buses.name: Alerts
buses.description: Master alarm and caution tones that pre-empt other playback.

buses.name: Telemetry Hints
buses.description: Short cues that mark burns, comm windows, and PTC state changes.

buses.name: UI Feedback
buses.description: Checklist ticks, invalid toggle buzzes, and workspace interactions.

buses.name: Ambience
buses.description: Looped cabin hum, LM idle ambience, and surface atmospherics.

categories.name: Critical Alerts
categories.description: Master alarm and caution tones triggered by failures or escalating resource thresholds.

categories.name: Mission Callouts
categories.description: Historical CapCom and crew announcements that punctuate major events.

categories.name: Telemetry Markers
categories.description: Navigation, burn, and communications beeps that aid situational awareness.

categories.name: UI Feedback
categories.description: Confirmation and error sounds for checklist and panel interactions.

categories.name: Ambient Beds
categories.description: Looped beds that establish cockpit and lunar surface atmosphere.

cues.name: Master Alarm
cues.subtitle: MASTER ALARM
cues.source: Apollo 11 Caution and Warning System procedures, Mission Operations Report Section 3.8
cues.notes: Latched while hard failures or cascading recoverable faults remain active.

cues.name: Master Caution
cues.subtitle: MASTER CAUTION
cues.source: Apollo 11 CSM Caution and Warning operations checklist
cues.notes: Single-shot chime when resource margins cross caution thresholds or guidance mode changes.

cues.name: Go For TLI
cues.subtitle: CAPCOM: 'Apollo 11, you are Go for TLI.'
cues.notes: Plays as the TLI burn window opens after the go/no-go poll completes.

cues.name: CSM-LM Transposition Complete
cues.subtitle: Collins: 'Transposition and docking complete.'
cues.notes: Highlights the CSM docking with the LM stack before TLI ignition.

cues.name: Contact Light
cues.subtitle: Aldrin: 'Contact light.'
cues.notes: Triggers at LM descent final approach when the probe touches the lunar surface.

cues.name: Tranquility Base
cues.subtitle: Armstrong: 'Houston, Tranquility Base here. The Eagle has landed.'
cues.notes: Marks LM touchdown and transitions ambience to surface bed.

cues.name: One Small Step
cues.subtitle: Armstrong: 'That's one small step for man...'
cues.notes: Surface EVA ingress milestone; cues surface ambient swap and mission log highlight.

cues.name: DSN Acquisition
cues.subtitle: DSN tone
cues.source: Apollo 11 Flight Plan Section 8 DSN schedule notes
cues.notes: Plays when a communications pass opens; pairs with a separate loss tone on handover.

cues.name: DSN Loss of Signal
cues.subtitle: LOS tone
cues.source: Apollo 11 Flight Plan Section 8 DSN schedule notes
cues.notes: Signals the end of support from a DSN station as handover begins.

cues.name: Burn Start
cues.subtitle: Burn start tone
cues.source: Apollo 11 Mission Operations Report Section 3.3 guidance monitoring cues
cues.notes: Single beep when SPS or DPS throttle rises above 5%, paired with telemetry.burn_complete.

cues.name: Burn Complete
cues.subtitle: Burn complete tone
cues.source: Apollo 11 Mission Operations Report Section 3.3 guidance monitoring cues
cues.notes: Pairs with telemetry.burn_start to bracket SPS/DPS maneuver execution windows.

cues.name: PTC Entry
cues.subtitle: PTC tone
cues.source: Apollo 11 Flight Journal Day 2 Passive Thermal Control commentary
cues.notes: Confirms the simulator enters or exits Passive Thermal Control; also feeds the Always-On HUD indicator.

cues.name: Checklist Step Complete
cues.subtitle: Checklist tick
cues.source: Apollo 11 Flight Plan procedural cadence notes
cues.notes: Short tick confirming manual or auto acknowledgement of a checklist step.

cues.name: Invalid Toggle
cues.subtitle: Error buzz
cues.source: Apollo 11 panel dependency notes used in controls view
cues.notes: Plays when a switch change violates prerequisite dependencies or a checklist predicate fails.

cues.name: Panel Focus
cues.subtitle: Focus tap
cues.source: Apollo 11 console workflow notes from Mission Operations Report Section 3.10
cues.notes: Light tap as operators cycle HUD focus between panel workspaces.

cues.name: CSM Cabin Hum
cues.source: Apollo 11 onboard audio characterizations published in the Mission Operations Report
cues.notes: Default ambience when the crew is in the Command Module outside of EVA operations.

cues.name: LM Cabin Idle
cues.source: Apollo 11 Lunar Module environmental audio captured in Mission Operations Report Section 3.8
cues.notes: LM ECS fan and instrumentation ambience used during powered descent prep and ascent checkout.

cues.name: Surface Tranquility
cues.source: Apollo 11 EVA surface audio beds documented in Flight Journal Day 5 EVA transcripts
cues.notes: Windless lunar surface bed with suit pump hum and distant radio static for EVA playback.
